snippet.title: Elevated property surrounded by bushland is absolute paradise - realestate.com.au
snippet.content:
28-38 Ridgewood Court, Ferny Hills.
A stunning Brisbane hilltop retreat, on a 2ha allotment, will go under the hammer tonight. The three-level property at is on the market for the first time.
28-38 Ridgewood Court, Ferny Hills.
28-38 Ridgewood Court, Ferny Hills.
With panoramic views through to Moreton Island, the home is framed by Queensland bushland. The five-bedroom, three-bathroom home is being marketed Ray White - Wilston selling agent Holly Bowden.
28-38 Ridgewood Court, Ferny Hills.
The property, which is in a quiet cul-de-sac, features an in-ground pool, covered gazebo and turfed poolside area which is perfect for children.
28-38 Ridgewood Court, Ferny Hills.
28-38 Ridgewood Court, Ferny Hills.
Also on-site are multiple fruit trees, chicken coops, children's fort and swings. The property is a short drive to Bunya and Samford Village. The property goes to auction today (August 3) at 6pm.
